0.2.1.name: wordpress/itunes-affiliate-link-maker
0.2.1.description:
Do you link to the iTunes Store with or without an affiliate program? this plugins for you!

The plugin adds an itunes button to the visual editor which when clicked bring forward a jquery dialog containing a search for the iTunes store link maker.

After searching, clicking on any link will ask for a title for the link and insert it into the content editor. iTALM also enables the ability to directly link to albums, something the standard link generator does not normally do.

iTALM also keeps track of recently clicked links and offers them up for clicking prior to searching, while also offering a link masking to hide your affiliate junk from captain smarty pants.
